campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: "Bɔ ɔkra nhyiam URL a ɛyɛ pɔtee."
campaignevents-error-meeting-url-not-onl: Sɛ ɛyɛ ɔnlaen ɛneɛ, na ɛnnyɛ ɛberɛ a wobɛka nhyiam no URL ho.
campaignevents-error-countryoraddress-no: Sɛ ɛnyɛ wim hyia (face-to-face) a, ɛnsɛ sɛ wobɔ nhyiam ɔman ne adres no ho nsɛm.
campaignevents-error-invalid-address: Fa intanɛt so nkrata a edi mu no hyɛ mu.
campaignevents-error-invalid-chat-url: "Bɔ URL a ɛyɛ chat a ɛfata."
campaignevents-error-invalid-question-na: Wɔngye nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi ntum yɛ: $1
campaignevents-error-move-eventpage-name: Bɔne kyerɛwtohɔ ntumi nyɛ ho wɔ nsɛmfua bea yi mu.
campaignevents-edit-form-details-subtitl: Ma nsɛm a ɛfa dwumadi a worehyehyɛ no ho
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: Dwumadi kratafa biara wɔ nsɛm a ɛfa wo dwumadie no ho.Obiara a ɔyɛ bi bɛtumi atwerɛ ne din wɔ dwumadie kratafa no hɔ.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-hel: Fa akontaabu din a ɛyɛ wɔfoɔ foforɔ ho na ma wɔnya ho kwan sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ saa bɔne no.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-cre: Ɛno ne nea ɔbɔɔ bɔne no, wɔfoɔ foforɔ ntumi mmpeprɛ saa ɔde no.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-use: Saa {{GENDER:$1|yɛfoɔ}} yi nni ho kwan sɛ ɔbɛbɔ bɔne.
campaignevents-edit-field-wiki-type: Ɛbɔne yi de ne tirim si wikis bi a ɛyɛ pɔtee so anaa?
campaignevents-edit-field-wiki-type-none: Wikis biara nni hɔ a ɛyɛ pɔtee.
campaignevents-edit-field-wikis-label: Wiki ahodoɔ a asi ani so
campaignevents-edit-field-wikis-placehol: Fa wiki ahodoɔ pɔtee ka ho
campaignevents-edit-field-wikis-help: Sɛ w’abɔne reyɛ wɔ wikis a wɔayɛ pɔtee so a, mepa wo kyɛw, kyerɛw wɔn din wɔ ha. Eyi bɛboa nnipa ama wɔatumi ayɛ wɔn bo sɛ wɔbɛka ho, na ɛbɛboa nso ama nsesagua ho akyinnye.
campaignevents-edit-field-tracking-tools: Awofo din a wɔabɛtɛw akyerɛw ho wɔ mankɛsɛm bɛkɔ Dashboard no ho automatisch. Ɔtɛkyerɛma yi bɛboa wo ama wobehu abatoɔfo mmoa na wopima ɔyare a wo nkɔmmɔbea no yɛ. [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Sua pii].
Fa Programs & Events Dashboard URL no kɔ mu ma wo bɔne no.
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: Sɛ wowɔ wɛb nkɔmmɔbɔ kɔnkɔnkɔn ama bɔne yi afa no ho a, wobetumi de frɛ link no bɛha. Wɔn a wɔakyerɛw wɔn ho akɔ so bɛtumi ahu frɛ link no.
campaignevents-edit-field-event-is-test: Ɛyɛ aseɛ bɔne anaa sɔhwɛ bɔne?
campaignevents-edit-field-topics-help: Wobetumi de mpɛn a ɛyɛ {{PLURAL:$1|tema baako|tema $1}} pɛn mu.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-label: Nsɛmmisa ɛma wɔn a wɔka ho
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-intro: Paw nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi mu biara ma wɔn a wɔka ho no nbua bere a wɔretwerɛ wɔn din wɔ dwumadi no ase.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-expla: Wɔ bɔne no mu, wobetumi ahu mmuae a wɔn a wɔka ho de mae ama nsɛmma a ɛnyɛ wɔn ankasa nsɛm a wɔde hu wɔn (PII). Bere a bɔne no awie a, mmuae no bɛyɛ hɔ, nanso ɛbɛyɛ dodoɔ pɛ, na wɔbɛpopa wɔn ankasa mmuae.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-non-p: Nsɛmma a ɛnyɛ Wɔn Ankasa Nsɛm a Wɔde Hu Wɔn (non-PII)
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-pii-l: Nsɛmma a ɛwɔ Wɔn Ankasa Nsɛm a Wɔde Hu Wɔn (PII)
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-pii-n: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wohu wɔn a wɔka ho mmuae a wɔayɛ dodoɔ a ɛwɔ wɔn ankasa nsɛm a wɔde hu wɔn (PII), wobɛsrɛ wo sɛ wode abɔ wɔn ho ban. Ɛsɛ sɛ wode wɔn nsɛm a wɔboaboa ano wɔ bɔne kyerɛwtohɔ mu hwɛ yie.
campaignevents-edit-form-notice: Wɔbɛboaboa akontaabu din nkutoo ano fi wɔn a wɔbɛka ho bere a wɔbɛyɛ kyerɛwtohɔ. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Registration Fa ho nsɛm pii].
campaignevents-edit-invalid-id: Fa dwumadie ahyɛnsode a edi mu to dwa.
campaignevents-edit-no-event-id: Krataafa yi nni bɔne ID a ɛtɛnn. Fa bɔne ID a ɛtɛnn kɔ mu, anaasɛ hwɛ bɔne nyinaa wɔ [[Special:AllEvents|Nhyiam ahodoɔ no lista]].
campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: "Ensɛ wɔ ho biara a ɛwɔ saa ID yi."
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal: "Mepa wo kyɛw, '''[$1 sɛe wo nsɛmma wɔ $2]''', wiki a wɔbɔɔ nsɛmma no so."
campaignevents-edit-need-central-account: "Wɔhiahia wo sɛ w’anya akontaabu foforɔ a ɛbɔ hye den na wobetumi ama anaasɛ asesa nsɛmma."
campaignevents-edit-organizers-not-allow: "$2 {{PLURAL:$1|nni|nnim}} ho kwan a ɛhia sɛ ɔyɛ {{PLURAL:$1|nea ɔto toa no|wɔn a wɔto toa no}}."
campaignevents-edit-no-organizers: "Nsɛmma bɛhia ɔpanyin baako atɔ so. Mepa wo kyɛw, fa ɔpanyin ka ho anaasɛ popa nsɛmma no sɛ ɛnyɛ hia bio."
campaignevents-edit-removed-creator: "Wo ntumi nnyi $1, efisɛ {{GENDER:$1|saa ɔdeyɛfo yi}} na ɔbɔɔ nsɛmma no."
campaignevents-edit-no-creator: "Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wobue nsɛmma a edi kan a, ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo ho ka ho sɛ ɔpanyin."
campaignevents-edit-too-many-organizers: "Wo ntumi nnya ɔpanyin dodow a ɛboro $1 {{PLURAL:$1|ɔpanyin|ɔpanyinfo}}."
campaignevents-edit-organizer-need-centr: "Wɔn a ɛda so yi {{PLURAL:$1|ɔdeyɛfo no nni|ɔdeyɛfo no nnim}} akontaabu foforɔ na wɔn ntumi nnya sɛ {{PLURAL:$1|ɔpanyin|ɔpanyinfo}}: $2."
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: Ɛda ho no nsɛmma no wɔ akyɛde a wɔde ato ho dada."
Wo ntumi nwie adwuma no efisɛ nsɛmma no atɔ ho fi nsɛmma no ho."
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: "Woennye ho kwan sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosesa nsɛmma yi."
campaignevents-enable-registration-not-a: "Woennye ho kwan sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode nsɛmma bu event no ho."
campaignevents-register-error-no-event-i: "Saa krataa yi nni event ID a ɛyɛ nokware. Kɔto event ID a ɛyɛ nokware anaa hwɛ nsɛmma a ɛwɔ Collaboration List no mu."
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: Dwumadie biara nni hɔ a ɛwɔ saa ID yi.

campaignevents-unregister-not-participan: Wontwerɛ wo din mma dwumadie yi.

campaignevents-edit-registration-deleted: Wɔapopa saa dwumadi yi ho dintwerɛ.
campaignevents-register-registration-del: Wontumi ntwerɛ wo din mma dwumadie wei efisɛ woapopa.
campaignevents-unregister-registration-d: Wontumi ntwa wo dwumadi dintwerɛ no mu efisɛ woapopa.

campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-dates-la: Bere a ɛbɛhyɛ ne bere a ɛbɛto so
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-link-not: Link no bɛyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ afa {{PLURAL:$1|ɔdeɛ no|ɔdeɛfoɔ no}}.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-link-reg: To so na wopɛ sɛ wuhu dɔkɔdɔkɔ link no.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-venue-no: Beae no adwuma ho kwan bɛyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ afa {{PLURAL:$1|ɔdeɛ no|ɔdeɛfoɔ no}}.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-chat-lab: Kɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ nkɔmmɔ group no mu
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-chat-not: Ɔnkɔmmɔ group bi nni hɔ ma dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi.

campaignevents-eventpage-register-notifi: Wopɛ so na woadi so wɔ $1.
Kɔ [[Special:AllEvents|Nkabom list]] no so na hu dɔkɔdɔkɔ ne nkabom foforo.
W'adi so a, w'ayɛ nkɔsoɔ wɔ wo nsɛmfua ho.

Wopɛ sɛ wopaw wo nsɛmfua ho a, ɛyɛ nokware?

campaignevents-eventpage-registration-en: Nsɛmfua ho yɛ a ɛda so. Mmaabafo bɛtumi atɔ so wɔ wo dɔkɔdɔkɔ krataa no so.
campaignevents-eventpage-registration-up: Dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi da ho wɔ [[Special:AllEvents|Nkabom list]] no mu.
campaignevents-eventpage-enableheader-ev: Dɔkɔdɔkɔ krataa: Ma nsɛmfua ho yɛ a, na mmaabafo bɛtumi atɔ so wɔ krataa no so direktee.
campaignevents-eventpage-enable-registra: Ɛma mmaabafo bɛtumi atɔ so de kɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ no direktee wɔ krataa yi so.
campaignevents-event-details-header-ques: Nsɛm a ɛfa data so ho

Nsɛmmisa a ɛfa ɔbaafo biara ho a ɛda ho wɔ tafere no so bɛyɛ kakra na wode bɛtɔ mu, na ɛbɛpo w'adan mu 90 da akyi anaa awiei dɔkɔdɔkɔ no (nea ɛba kan no). Wɔde nsɛm a wɔbɔ ho bɛyɛ kakra no bɛda ho wɔ "{{int:campaignevents-event-details-tab-stats}}" tab no so, a ɛbɛda hɔ akyi dɔkɔdɔkɔ no.
campaignevents-event-details-tracking-to: Mmaabafo din a ɛda ho wɔ Dashboard no so a ɛda hɔ.
Ɛntumi nsesa mmaabafo bi din a ɛda ho wɔ Dashboard no so.
campaignevents-event-details-chat-link-n: Ɔnkɔmmɔ group bi nni hɔ ma dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi.
campaignevents-event-details-wikis-all: Dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi da ho ma wikis nyinaa.
campaignevents-event-details-register-pr: Ɛsɛ sɛ woto so ansa na wuhu nsɛm yi.
campaignevents-event-details-no-organize: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotumi de krataa kɔma mmaabafo a, ɛsɛ sɛ wowɔ email address wɔ wo akawnt so. [[Special:ChangeEmail|Fa email ka ho]].
campaignevents-event-details-remove-part: Wopɛ sɛ wopopa {{PLURAL:$1|ɔbaafo|mmaabafo}} a wopaw no?
campaignevents-event-details-no-particip: Mmaabafo din bɛda hɔ ha bere a wɔbɛtɔ so.
campaignevents-event-details-event-delet: Dɔkɔdɔkɔ nsɛmfua ho no atɔ so.
campaignevents-event-details-invalid-id: Ma dɔkɔdɔkɔ ID a ɛyɛ nokware.
campaignevents-event-details-not-found: Dɔkɔdɔkɔ biara nni hɔ a ne ID yɛ eyi.
campaignevents-event-details-online-link: Link no bɛyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ afa {{PLURAL:$1|ɔdeɛ no|ɔdeɛfoɔ no}}.
campaignevents-event-details-venue-not-a: Beae no adwuma ho kwan bɛyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ afa {{PLURAL:$1|ɔdeɛ no|ɔdeɛfoɔ no}}.
campaignevents-event-details-dates-label: Bere a ɛbɛhyɛ ne bere a ɛbɛto so
campaignevents-unregister-participants-p: Wɔnhyɛ wo kwan sɛ wopopa mmaabafo.
campaignevents-unregister-participants-r: Wɔntumi mpopɔ mmaabafo fi dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi mu efisɛ wɔatɔ so.
campaignevents-event-details-remove-part: Ɛyɛɛ sɛnea ɛda ho no, na ɛyɛ bɔne sɛ wokɔpɔpɔ {{PLURAL:$1|ɔbaafo|mmaabafo}} no.
campaignevents-event-details-organizers-: Ɛsɛ sɛ wo ma JavaScript ho tumi sɛnea wobɛtumi ahu nhyehyɛefo no nyinaa
campaignevents-tracking-tool-p&e-dashboa: Dwumadie ne akansie ahodoɔ a ɛda intanɛt so
campaignevents-tracking-tool-http-error: Mfomso bi a wonnim bae bere a na wɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛyɛ w’akadeɛ ahodoɔ a wɔde di akyi ho adwuma no.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-con: Esan sɛ nhyehyɛe ho asɛm bi nti, wontumi mfa $1 nyɛ adwuma.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ saa dwumadie yi biara nni hɔ a wɔboa nhyehyɛeɛ $1.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-alr: Nhyehyɛeɛ $1 wɔ wɔn a wɔka ho dada enti wɔn ntumi nka dwumadie yi ho.
Nhyehyɛeɛ $1 ɛka dwumadie ho dada na ɛntumi nka foforo ho bio.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Nhyehyɛeɛ $1 nka dwumadie yi ho enti ɛntumi nhyia.
campaignevents-userlink-suppressed-user: Wodin a wode di dwuma no yaka ahyɛ
campaignevents-registration-confirmation: Prɔfɛtɛ nsɛmfua ho: Wo din a ɛda mmaabafo krataa no mu betumi ada hɔ ma dɔkɔdɔkɔ ɔdeɛfoɔ ne {{PLURAL:$2|group|groups}} a ɛda ho yi: $1. W’adwuma a wobɛyɛ wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ no mu betumi agyae ho wɔ [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] anaa akɔnnɔde foforɔ a wɔde boaboa nsɛnkanee ano mu.

Prɔfɛtɛ nsɛmfua ho: Wo din a ɛda mmaabafo no mu betumi ada hɔ ma ɔdeɛfoɔ nko ara. W’adwuma a wobɛyɛ wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ no mu betumi afa ho anaa wobetumi agyae ho wɔ [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] anaa akɔnnɔde foforɔ a wɔde boaboa nsɛnkanee ano mu.

Fɛw nsɛmfua ho: Kyerɛ wo din wɔ mmaabafo krataa a ɛda hɔ ma obiara. W’adwuma a wobɛyɛ wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ no mu betumi aka ho a ɔdeɛfoɔ bɛde akɔ [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] anaa akɔnnɔde foforɔ a wɔde boaboa nsɛnkanee ano mu.
echo-pref-tooltip-campaign-events-notifi: Ma menhu a wɔde Event Registration akɔnnɔde no rekyerɛ me bere a metɔ so wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ bi mu.
campaignevents-notification-registration: Kɔ $1 de bɛhyia mmaabafo foforo na wunya nkɔsoɔ fi ɔdeɛfoɔ no.
Kɔ [[Special:AllEvents|Nkabom list]] no so na hu dɔkɔdɔkɔ ne nkabom foforo wɔ wikis no mu.
campaignevents-event-details-email-subje: Asɛm a ɛwɔ w'email krataa mu
campaignevents-event-details-email-messa: W'email krataa mu nkyerɛaseɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ dodoɔ 10 nsɛm anaa ho.
campaignevents-event-details-email-ccme-: Email ma me kopi a ɛwɔ me krataa no.
campaignevents-email-select-participant-: Mepa wo kyɛw, paw mmerɛfo a wɔwɔ email a ɛyɛ nokware.
campaignevents-email-participants-missin: Ɛwɔ sɛ wopaw mmaabafo bi a wɔwɔ email address wɔ wɔn akawnt so, efisɛ mmaabafo a wɔnni email address no rentumi nnya w'email no. Wubetumi de krataa kɔma wɔn sɛ wopaw wɔn din na kɔ wɔn user talk krataa so.
campaignevents-email-footer: W'email no yɛɛ {{GENDER:$1|de}} $1 kɔma {{GENDER:$2|$2}}, ɔbaafo a ɔato so wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi mu: $3. Sɛ {{GENDER:$2|wopɛ}} sɛ wopɛ asɛm wɔ w'email yi ho a, {{GENDER:$2|wo}} email bɛkɔ kɔma {{GENDER:$1|ɔdeɛ no}}, na ɛda {{GENDER:$2|wo}} email address ho adwuma ma {{GENDER:$1|ɔdeɛ no}}.
campaignevents-email-footer-collaboratio: Kɔ Nkabom list no so na hu dɔkɔdɔkɔ ne nkabom foforo wɔ wikis no mu: $1
campaignevents-email-self-subject: Kopi a ɛwɔ w'krataa no ma mmaabafo a wɔwɔ $1
campaignevents-register-questions-label-: Nsɛm yi bɛda ho ma dɔkɔdɔkɔ ɔdeɛfoɔ nko ara.
campaignevents-register-question-gender: Dɛn na ɛyɛ wo ho nsɛmfua a ɛfa wo nananom ho? (Nsu yɛ a ɛnyɛ pɛ)
campaignevents-register-question-gender-: Mepa wo kyɛw, menpɛ sɛ meka.
Nnipa ho nsɛmfua a ɛnni hɔ
campaignevents-register-question-age: Dɛn na wo mfe? (Nsu yɛ a ɛnyɛ pɛ)
campaignevents-register-question-age-opt: Wɔn a wɔnni mmoroo aduonu num
campaignevents-register-question-profess: Adwuma bɛn na wo yɛ? (ɛnyɛ ɔhyɛ)
Dwumadie a ɛfa nsɛm ho nimdefo
Tete nneɛma akoraeɛ anaa akorae ho nimdefoɔ
Adwuma ho nimdeɛ a wɔnfa nhwehwɛ mfasoɔ
campaignevents-register-question-confide: So w'ani gye ho sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no? (ɔnyɛ nhyɛ)
Mewɔ suahunu bi, nanso menni akokoɔduro
Mewɔ suahunu kakra, na mewɔ akokoɔduro sɛ mɛtumi aboa, nanso mepɛ sɛ mesua pii ka ho
Mewɔ awerɛhyem sɛ mɛtumi aboa a minya mmoa biara .
campaignevents-register-question-affilia: Woyɛ ɔbaakofo wɔ Wikimedia ho nnamfo (chapters, user groups, thematic organizations) bi mu? (Nsu yɛ a ɛnyɛ pɛ)
campaignevents-register-question-confide: Nti wowɔ akokoɔduro sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no?
campaignevents-register-question-affilia: Wo ka Wikimedia kuo bi ho (mfapem, nnipakuo, nnwumakuo a ɛfa nsɛm ho)?
campaignevents-register-question-confide: Nti wowɔ akokoɔduro sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no?
campaignevents-register-question-affilia: Wo ka Wikimedia kuo bi ho (mfapem, nnipakuo, nnwumakuo a ɛfa nsɛm ho)?
campaignevents-register-answers-aggregat: Wo mmuae no aboa ano na wɔatɔ so sɛnea ɛda ho wɔ nsɛm fa data a wɔkora ho ho.
campaignevents-register-retention-title: Nsɛm fa data a wɔkora ho ho
campaignevents-register-retention-base: Wo mmuaeɛ no bɔaboa ano na ɛkyɛ 90 nna akyi no, anaa bere a ɛda no to ba no a ɛba kan no, na wɔpam no. Wubetumi asesa wo mmuaeɛ no da biara ansa na ɛreba saa bere no. Sɛ wɔpam a, ɛnntumi nsesa bio, ɛnntumi nso mmua bio, na ɛnntumi mfa bio.
campaignevents-register-retention-days: Bere a aka ansa na wɔbɔaboa wo mmuaeɛ ano na wɔpam no ne: $1 {{PLURAL:$1|da|nnawɔtwe}}.
campaignevents-register-retention-hours: Bere a aka ansa na wɔbɔaboa wo mmuaeɛ ano na wɔpam no ne: aka dɔnhwere 24 nketewa.
campaignevents-eventpage-register-dialog: Nsɛm yi bɛka nko ara akɔ akɔma wɔn a wɔyɛ ɛda no ahyehyɛfo.
W’ano nsɛm abɔaboa ano na wɔapam no sɛnea ɛda ho nsɛm a ɛfa nsɛm kyɛ mu no kyerɛ.

Wo mmuaeɛ no bɔaboa ano, na wɔpɛ akyiri no wɔpam no nnansa aduasa (90) akyi, anaa ɛda a ɛda no to ba no, nea ɛba kan no. Wubetumi asesa wo mmuaeɛ da biara ansa na ɛbɛyɛ saa. Sɛ wɔpam a, ɛnntumi nsesa, ɛnntumi mmua bio, na ɛnntumi mfa bio.
Bere a aka ansa na wɔbɔaboa wo mmuaeɛ ano na wɔpam no ne: $1 {{PLURAL:$1|da|nnansa}}.
Bere a aka ansa na wɔbɔaboa wo mmuaeɛ ano na wɔpam no ne: aka dɔnhwere 24 nketewa.
campaignevents-details-stats-no-response: Ɛda yi nni mmuaeɛ bi fi akɔkɔɔfo a wɔde bɛbɔaboa.
campaignevents-details-stats-not-ready: Akɔkɔɔfo no mmuaeɛ bɛbɔaboa na wɔde bɛda ho wɔ ha ntɛm.
campaignevents-details-stats-section-non: Nsɛmmisa a ɛfa nsɛm a ɛmma wontumi nhu nipa ko (non-PII)
campaignevents-details-stats-section-pii: Nsɛmmisa a ɛfa nipa ho nsɛm (PII) ho
campaignevents-details-stats-not-enough-: Saa asɛmmisa yi anya mmuaeɛ a ɛnnu $1 {{PLURAL:$1| mmuae|mmuae}}.
campaignevents-event-dates-cannot-be-cha: Dwumadie no aba n’awieiɛ, enti wuntumi nsesa dwumadie  no nna nkɔ daakye nna mu. Saa kwan yi so no, wɔbɔ adwumamfo no ho nsɛm ho ban.
campaignevents-individual-stats-label-me: Nti wowɔ akokoɔduro sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no?
Wo ka Wikimedia kuo bi ho (mfapem, nnipakuo, nnwumakuo a ɛfa nsɛm ho)?
campaignevents-edit-field-clickwrap-chec: Saa kratafa yi mu no, na wobɛtumi ahu nsɛmmisa a ɛwɔ ayɛfoɔ dintwerɛ no mu no ho mmuaeɛ.
Sε wopε sε wohu mmuaeɛ a wכde aka ho a wכde wכn ankasa ho nsεm aka ho a,ɛsɛ sɛ wogye nea edidi so yi tum:
Mepene so sɛ mɛhwɛ ayɛfoɔ ho  nsɛm so yiye, ebi ne ayɛfoɔ ho nsɛm a wɔfa so hu nipa, a wɔaboaboa ano bere a wɔretwerɛ din wɔ dwumadie no ase no so yiye.
campaignevents-participant-question-have: Eyi {{GENDER:$1| wɔaboaboa participant's}} mmuaeɛ ano na wɔapopa
campaignevents-warning-change-event-end-: Sɛ wo sesa da a wɔde bɛwie no kɔ da bi a atwam a, wɔbɛto dwumadi no mu na wo nsa bɛka mmuaeɛ a wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛɛ mu no de maeɛ no tiawa. Wɔrentumi nsan nyɛ saa adeyɛ yi. Sɛ wɔn ama ayɛfoɔ nsɛmmisa no ho mmuaeɛ a, eyi fata.
campaignevents-event-details-participant: Wɔayi ayɛfoɔ no ano nsɛm no afiri hɔ, na wɔn ano nsɛm a wɔaka no nyinaa wɔ [$1 {{int:campaignevents-event-details-tab-stats}}] ase.
campaignevents-register-page-nonlocal: Yɛsrɛ wo '''[$1 wie wo dwumadi no ho twerԑtohɔ wɔ $2]'', wiki a wɔhyehyɛɛ dwumadi no wɔ hɔ.
campaignevents-delete-registration-page-: Yɛsrɛ wo '''[$1 yi wo dwumadi no ho dintwerɛ wɔ $2]''', wiki a wɔyɛɛ dwumadi no wɔ hɔ.
campaignevents-event-details-page-nonloc: Seesei worehwɛ kratafa yi nkyekyɛmu a wɔaka ho asɛm. Yԑ srԑ sԑ wobԑ [$1 bԑsraa kratafa yi wɔ $2], wiki beaԑ a' yԑyɛɛ dwumadi no, sԑnea wobԑnya dwumadi no ho nsԑm nyinaa ne nsԑm afoforo.
campaignevents-event-details-sensitive-d: W'ahwɛde no asiw. Wuntumi nhwehwɛ eyi mu.
campaignevents-generateinvitationlist-ar: Hyehyɛ edin a ɛkɔ soro kodu $1 {{PLURAL:$1| article|articles}} a ɛka wo dwumadi no mu nsɛmti no ho. Ɛsɛ sɛ asɛm biara wɔ ɔfa foforo so. Ɛno akyi no, wɔbɛhyehyɛ wɔn a wɔboa nsɛm no ho din a, egyina nsɛm a woaka no so.
campaignevents-invitation-list-disabled: Saa wiki yi nni nsrahwɛ a wɔto nsa frɛ no so.
campaignevents-invitation-list-not-allow: Wɔmma wo kwan sɛ wode nsato din a wɔahyehyɛ no bedi dwuma.
campaignevents-myinvitationslist-empty-t: Hwehwɛ nnipa foforo a wɔde wɔn ho bɛhyɛ mu ama wo dwumadie. Fa nsɛm a ɛka wo dwumadie no mu nsɛmti ho asɛm ma. Afei, wo nsa bɛka nsato krataa a ɛkyerɛ samufoɔ a ebia wɔn ani begye ho sɛ wɔbɛka wo dwumadi no ho.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-emp: Ma din bi a wode bɛhyɛ nsato krataa no mu.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-inv: Fa dwumadie kratafa a ɔde dwumadi twerԑtohɔ di dwuma.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-eve: Saa dwumadie yi aba awieiɛ. Fa dwumadi a ɛyɛ adwuma bi hyɛ mu.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-not: Fa dwumadie kratafa a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wo na wo di ho dwuma.
campaignevents-worklist-error-empty: Fa asɛmti no baako ka ho.
campaignevents-worklist-error-too-large: Woahyɛ $1 {{PLURAL:$1| asɛm|nsɛm}}. Yɛsrɛ wo fa 1 ne $2 ntam hyɛ mu {{PLURAL:$2| nsɛm a wɔatwerɛ}}.
campaignevents-worklist-error-invalid-ti:
Nea edidi so yi {{PLURAL:$1| asɛm no wɔ asɛmti a ɛnteɛ|nsɛm no wɔ nsɛmti a ɛnteɛ}}. Yɛsrɛ wo toto no yie {{PLURAL:$1| it|titles}} na mmɔden bio.
 $2
campaignevents-worklist-error-nonexisten:
Nea edidi so yi {{PLURAL:$1| asɛm no yɛ|nsɛm no yɛ}} wɔanhu. Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ sɛ {{PLURAL:$1| title|titles}} na bɔ mmɔden bio.
 $2
campaignevents-worklist-error-titles-not:
Nea edidi so yi {{PLURAL:$1| asɛm no yɛ|articles are}} enni din titiriw no mu. Yɛsrɛ wo twerɛ nsɛm no wɔ din titiriw no nkutoo mu.
 $2
campaignevents-invitation-list-processin: Worebɔ wo krataa samufoɔ a wobɛto nsa afrɛ wɔn no din. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuhu nsato krataa a wode bɛto nsa afrɛ nkurɔfo, gye simma 5-10 na woasesa krataa no.
campaignevents-invitation-list-invalid-i: Ma adansedie nkrataa ID a edi mu. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Hwɛ wo nsato krataa ahodoɔ]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-does-not-: Saa nsato krataa yi nni hɔ. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Hwɛ wo nsato krataa ahodoɔ]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-not-creat: Wo nni  ho kwan sɛ wobɛhwɛ nsato krataa yi efisɛ woannyɛ. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Hwɛ wo nsato krataa ahodoɔ]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-nonlocal: Yɛsrɛ wo '''[ $1 hwɛ nsato krataa yi wɔ $2 ]''', wiki a wɔyɛɛ no.
campaignevents-invitation-list-intro: $1 {{PLURAL:$1| editor|editors}} y’ahu, a egyina gyinapɛn a edidi so yi so:nsɛm a wɔde boaa yɛ, nsakrae dodoɔ a wɔyɛe wɔ nsɛm no mu, wɔn nsakrae nyinaa dodoɔ wɔ wiki ahodoɔ no so, ne sɛnea wɔasesa wiki ahodoɔ no nnansa yi ara.
campaignevents-invitationlist-no-editors: Atwerɛfo biara nni hɔ a wodu [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Invitation_lists nsato krataa nhyehyɛe] a efi wo nsɛm a wɔahyehyɛ no mu. Wubetumi [[Special:GenerateInvitationList|ayɛ nsato krataa foforo]] de asɛm foforo a wɔahyehyɛ.
campaignevents-invitationlist-highly-rec: Yɛhyɛ wo nkuran paa sɛ to nsa frɛ
Nkrataa samufoɔ yi nyaa nsato a ɛkorɔn wɔ nsato krataa a wɔato nsa afrɛ wɔn no so, enti wɔn ho bɛtɔ wɔn wɔ w'adwuma no mu.
campaignevents-invitationlist-recommende: Hyɛ no nkuran sɛ wɔn to nsa
Saa atwerɛfo yi nyaa nsato krataa a wɔato nsa afrɛ wɔn, nanso ebia wɔn ani begye ho sɛ wɔbɛka w'adwuma no ho.
campaignevents-event-details-footer: Kɔ [[Special:AllEvents|Di nsawɔsoɔ list]] hɔ kɔhwehwɛ dwumadie ahodoɔ ne nkuo pii.
campaignevents-invitationlist-preference: Fa me ka [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MeKasa/Mmoa:Ntrɛwmu:CampaignEvents/Invitation_lists nsato krataa ahodoɔ] ho.
campaignevents-eventslist-all-wikis: Saa dwumadie yi yɛ ma wikifoɔ nyinaa.
campaignevents-eventpage-all-wikis: Saa dwumadie yi yɛ ma wikifoɔ nyinaa.
campaignevents-allevents-label-upcoming-: Dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛbaso daakye: Dwuamdie ahodoɔ a ebesisi wɔ nna a wɔapaw no mu
campaignevents-allevents-label-ongoing-e: Dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛkɔso:Dwumadie ahodoɔ a ahyɛ ase dada nanso ɛbɛ toaso wɔ nna a wɔapaw no mu
